  • Element Multi-value Representation (pydicom.multival)

Element Multi-value Representation (pydicom.multival)¶

Representation of the values for data elements with VM > 1.

MultiValue(type_constructor, iterable)

Class to hold any multi-valued DICOM value, or any list of items that are all of the same type.
